posts.post_content:
--See New additions with Bender portrait at bottom--

My other thread ["More than 100"] has become unwieldy and rather ineffective at selling, so I'm starting a new thread with 17 new cards.  Do take a look at my other thread if you're looking for ungraded cards and want to combine shipping/get a multiple item discount.

Email djdoremus@ msn.com  --No pm's; my PM Box is full--

First to take a card gets it.  Discounts for combined shipping/multiple items.

Most forms of payment okay; paypal as friend [no messages, please]; thanks. Regular paypal, add 3%.

KELLEY, [STRIKE]$62[/STRIKE] $59 delivered,--SOLD--

page of 15, from Poor to VG: Individual cards, add $1 S/H; more than one card, free shipping.  Additional discount on four or more.

Note: As the page is turned, the backs are in reverse order. 
Also, the cards are in two protective plastics, a halved penny-sleeve--which creates the appearance of a vertical line on each card--and a pocket-page:

Pickering, $20, 
Mitchell, $20 --SOLD--
Devlin, $20,
Weimer [tobacco stains, but no apparent creases], $21,--SOLD--
Overall portrait, $22,--SOLD--
Jacklitsch, [Old Mill, specks of paper-loss on back], $22,--SOLD--
Randall, $18,
G. Brown, Chicago, $16,--SOLD--
Schulte front, $22,--SOLD--
Schulte back, Piedmont 460, [VG-Ex front, spot of paper-loss on back, right corner], $20,--SOLD--
Hoblitzell, $19,
White throwing, Chicago, Polar Bear, $18,
Elberfeld fielding, $20,
Kling, $17, 
Myers catching. $17--SOLD--

Page 3--New Additions--Add $1 S/H; more than one card, free shipping.

Lajoie portrait, $92,
Clymer, $19,
Dubuc, $16

Bender portrait, Sov. 150 [Look at that lipstick! Paper-loss on back], $52,--SOLD--
Arndt, $28,
Clymer, $20
Four sold, Three new, with Lajoie portrait--

Nice cards Doug!

I'm interested in the Jacklitsch.  If you bought it, I can make you a nice trade offer.  Contact me if interested.
See bottom of the page for new scans.
